channel.title: Axoloti unable to compile anymore
channel.description:
Suddenly Axoloti stopped compiling any patch. Could be for some windows updates? Patches I'm using are made with 10.1.12 and the version I'm using is 10.1.12. I've reinstalled correctly Runtime and Axoloti but I still get this error:
Start compiling patch BDIR = C:\Users\Utente\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build FIRMWARE = . RM APP ! C:\Users\Utente\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch internal error in mingw32_gt_pch_use_address, at config/i386/host-mingw32.c:190: MapViewOfFileEx: Tentativo di accedere ad un indirizzo non valido.
make: *** [C:\Users\Utente\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.bin] Error 1 shell task failed, exit value: 1 Compiling patch failed ( D:\Projects\Axoloti\mon_tx2.axp

item.title: Axoloti unable to compile anymore
item.dc:creator: @AdrianWillaert
item.description:
@AdrianWillaert wrote:

Suddenly Axoloti stopped compiling any patch.
Could be for some windows updates?
Patches I'm using are made with 10.1.12 and the version I'm using is 10.1.12.
I've reinstalled correctly Runtime and Axoloti but I still get this error:

Start compiling patch
BDIR = C:\Users\Utente\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build
FIRMWARE = .
RM
APP
! C:\Users\Utente\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.h.gch
internal error in mingw32_gt_pch_use_address, at config/i386/host-mingw32.c:190: MapViewOfFileEx: Tentativo di accedere ad un indirizzo non valido.

make: *** [C:\Users\Utente\DOCUME~1\axoloti/build/xpatch.bin] Error 1
shell task failed, exit value: 1
Compiling patch failed ( D:\Projects\Axoloti\mon_tx2.axp
